summary: Adds the ability to cook delicious freshly-baked goods.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds recipes for creating delicious baked goods.

This version adds cooking recipes for four new items:
- Snowberry Pie (added in version 1.2)
- Steak and Ale Pie (added in version 1.2)
- Game Pie (added in version 1.2)
- Carrot Cake (added in version 1.2)

As well as recipes for four existing items:
- Bread (included in version 1.0)
- Apple Pie (included in version 1.0)
- Boiled Creme Treat (added in version 1.1)
- Sweet Roll (added in version 1.1)

I have devised more new recipes and am working on figuring out how to add my mouth-watering new meshes to the game.

I will be adding the new recipes in batches over the coming days, and the new meshes either when the new CS is released or I figure out how to do it in NifSkope and TESSnip!

Eventually I\'ll be setting up shop in Whiterun, with a selection of exotic ingredients on sale to allow eager artisan bakers to experiment with Cyrodilic and Breton style baking, as well as some tools of the trade...

Manual Installation:
Unzip and place BakingRecipes.esp in your Skrim\\Data folder. Activate it using the launcher, mod-manager or the plugins.txt file.

Uninstall:
Deactivate the mod and delete the .esp from the Skyrim\\Data folder.

Credits:
Thanks to Samutz for the incredibly useful tutorial on adding crafting recipes (which can be found here: http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1286593-tutorial-making-new-smithing-recipes-pre-ck/). And thanks to AeonVita for providing the link!

Usage:
If you want to use this in your own mod then please give me credit. Please do not upload my mod to websites other than Skyrim Nexus without first getting my permission.
author: aegishjalmur
